{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Cisco |model=Meraki MX64 |revision=W-HW |upc= |asin=B011KH26XK |est_release_date=02/05/2015 |fcc_date=01/27/2015 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=UDX-60032015 |ic_id=6961A-60032015 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.6 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM58522 |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=1 GiB |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9K8G08U0D |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=DDR3 |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 20-pin header,, |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43520;BCM43520KMLG; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43520;BCM43520KMLG; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:18:0A |oui_eth=00:18:0A }} {{TagLine|Small Branch Firewall Wireless Security Appliance}} :[https://meraki.cisco.com/products/appliances/mx64w Product page] {{•}} [http://mx64w-hw.com/ Datasheet]
The SoC pictured in the [https://fccid.io/UDX-60032015/External-Photos/Photos-External-2505286 FCC photos] appears to be an ''[[Broadcom]]'' product. {{see also|Cisco Meraki MX64|Meraki MX60W|Cisco Meraki MR32}}
*[http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/broadcom-unveils-worlds-most-highly-integrated-processor-soc-for-5g-wifi-enterprise-access-points-1-206398091.html ''Broadcom Processor SoC'' on '''PRNewswire'''] *[http://techinsights.com/reports-and-subscriptions/open-market-reports/Report-Profile/?ReportKey=10867 ''Meraki MX64W Report'' on '''Techinsights''']
===FCC ID=== *[https://fccid.io/UDX-60032015 UDX-60032015] (2015-01-27) - 802.11abgn/ac Wireless Router :[[Cisco Meraki MX64W]] • [https://meraki.cisco.com/products/appliances/mx64 PPage] (MX64) • [https://meraki.cisco.com/products/appliances/mx64w PPage] (MX64W) :CPU: [[Broadcom]] [http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/broadcom-unveils-worlds-most-highly-integrated-processor-soc-for-5g-wifi-enterprise-access-points-1-206398091.html BCM58522] (StrataGX ARM) • [https://www.meraki.com/lib/pdf/meraki_datasheet_mx.pdf MX] • [https://www.reddit.com/r/networking/comments/4fp2i8/hardware_specs_of_meraki_mx_line_cpu_ram_etc/ MX CPU] :2.4GHz WLAN: [[Broadcom]] BCM43520KMLG, Air Marshal Radio: - :5GHz WLAN: [[Broadcom]] BCM43520KMLG :LAN: 5x GbE ports, USB: 1x USB 2.0 (3G/4G)
===See also=== :[https://habrahabr.ru/company/muk/blog/320248/ Cisco Meraki MX Series] *[[Cisco Meraki MX64]] ✓ 50 :5× GbE, USB (3G/4G) *[[Cisco Meraki MX64W]] ✓ 50 :802.11ac WiFi, 5× GbE, USB (3G/4G) *[[Cisco Meraki MX65]] ✓ 50 :12× GbE (2× PoE+), USB (3G/4G) *[[Cisco Meraki MX65W]] ✓ 50 :802.11ac WiFi, 12× GbE (2× PoE+), USB (3G/4G) *[[Cisco Meraki MX84]] ✓ 200 :10x GbE, 2x SFP, USB (3G/4G) *[[Cisco Meraki MX100]] ✓ 500 :9x GbE, 2x SFP, 4x SFP+, USB (3G/4G) *[[Cisco Meraki MX400]] ✓ 2000 :20x GbE, 16x SFP, 4x SFP+, USB (3G/4G) *[[Cisco Meraki MX600]] ✓ 10000 :20x GbE, 16x SFP, 4x SFP+, USB (3G/4G)
